Name: Dr. C.N. Ashwath Narayan
Tweet: Nothing compares to the simple pleasure of riding a bicycle!  Sharing some glimpses from the #CycleRally held at Sampige Road, Malleswaram Circle. @BJP4Karnataka Karyakartas and supporters too participated in large numbers.   #Malleshwaram #Bengaluru #KarnatakaElections2018  https://t.co/TbprxhjYhz
